Sure, I'll bring the documents. Amoung these challenges is a smart egg incubator that can withstand the load shedding being experienced. It is an honor for us to present to you a smart incubator that we've developed. This incubator uses IOT to monitor the condition of the eggs namely, temperature and humidity and has a GSM interface which communicates to the user via SMS and periodically sends information to the user. It is further equipped with an automatic motor that automatically turns the eggs after a specialized period of time. All this information is stored on a database.
